name: Nothing Truly Changes
description:
In Development Not Complete This Is What It Will Be Eventually

Go to Full Screen

I ask that you provide feed back on how i can improve this game

This game is a journey through the life of a little cube that has to grip the harsh reality of life that nothing he can do will make  good things last forever. But even in this dark world he can find hope in his Father and friends as they tell him that even changing something temporarily if it is for good then it is worth doing.

a = left

d = right

space = jump

r = rewind objects in the world
